#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<sstream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
 
int main()
{
   ll t;
   cin>>t;
   
   while(t--)
   {
   		ll n,k;
   		cin>>n>>k;
   		int j=1;
   		ll no=9;
   		ll index=1;
   		ll sum=0;
   		for(int i=1;i<=16;i++)
   		{
   			sum+=(no*j);
   			if(k<=sum)
   				break;
   			no*=10;
   			j++;
   		}
   		sum-=(no*j);
   		ll diff=k-sum;
   		ll p=(pow(10.0,(double)(j-1))-1);
   		ll divi=diff/j;
   		p+=divi;
   		ll d=diff%j;
   		if(d==0)
   			{
   				//string s=tostring(p);
   				//cout<<s.at(j-1)<<"\n";
   				ostringstream oss;
			oss << p;
string s=oss.str();
	cout<<s.at(j-1)<<"\n";
   			}
   			else
   			{
   			//	string s=tostring((p+1));
   			//	cout<<s.at(d-1)<<"\n";
   			ostringstream oss;
			oss << (p+1);
string s=oss.str();
	cout<<s.at(d-1)<<"\n";	
   			}
   		
   }
   
}
